str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
Thus, so, in this manner. Or (referring to what precedes or follows).
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To give orders (injunctions, instructions, commands). From en and the base of telos; to enjoin.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To put, place, lay, set, fix, establish. A prolonged form of a primary theo to place.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Light, a source of light, radiance. From an obsolete phao; luminousness.
Probably from etho; a race, i.e. A tribe; specially, a foreign one.
I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Feminine of a derivative of soter as noun; rescue or safety.
A conjunction, preposition and adverb of continuance, until.
Last, at the last, finally, till the end. A superlative probably from echo; farthest, final.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Contracted from a primary word; soil; by extension a region, or the solid part or the whole of the terrene globe.
